install.name: Simple Twitter
install.author: Nathan Wells
install.description: A module that makes it easy to display your Twitter updates

param.name: tweetnumber
param.label: Number of tweets
param.description: The number of tweets you would like displayed - the maximum is 20

param.name: cache-time
param.label: Cache refresh time
param.description: Enter the number of minutes after which to refresh the cache

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
